info: Nepal is a landlocked country bordering the world's 2 most populous nations, India to the south and China to the north.
question: The world's highest mountain chain runs along the northern border of Nepal, what is it called?
correct: Correct! The Himalayas (meaning "abode of snow" in sanskrit) is home to 9 of the 10 highest peaks on earth, including the highest mountain above sea level, Mount Everest.
wrong: Sorry, wrong answer. The Himalayas (meaning "abode of snow" in sanskrit) is home to 9 of the 10 highest peaks on earth, including the highest mountain above sea level, Mount Everest.
